meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>ground</kanji> <kanji>storehouse</kanji> refers to a person's name. It may be easier to learn this one reading first because of that. Anyways, this person is <vocabulary>Jizo(u)</vocabulary>, a Bodhisattva, and protector of children.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
